sourcesContent:
import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import useFetch from "./useFetch"; const CountryDetails = () => { const {name}=useParams(); const {data, error, isLoding}=useFetch(`https://restcountries.com/v2/name/${name}`); return (
{isLoding &&
Data is loading
} {error &&
{error}
} {data &&
{data[0].name}
Native Name: {data[0].nativeName} Top Level Domaine: {data[0].topLevelDomain} Population: {data[0].population.toLocaleString('en-US')} Currencies: {data[0].currencies.map(currency=>(currency.name))} Region: {data[0].region} Languages: {data[0].languages.map(language=>(language.name+', '))} Sub Region: {data[0].subregion} Capital: {data[0].capital}
Border Countries:
{data[0].borders.map((b,idx)=>({b}))}
}
); } export default CountryDetails;
